description.value:
This stout staff is made from gnarled hawthorn. When used as a weapon, a staff of nature's vengeance permanently has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shillelagh]

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tangle Vine]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shocking Grasp], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spider Sting]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Floating Flame], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vomit Swarm]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Earthbind], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Thorns]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bestial Curse], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spike Stones]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Toxic Cloud], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Control Water]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Purple Worm Sting], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tangling Creepers]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sunburst], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Volcanic Eruption]
  • 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Earthquake], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Punishing Winds]
